meanings.definition: A periodical publication containing articles and illustrations.
meanings.sent1: I read a magazine about animals at the library.
meanings.sent2: She bought a fashion magazine at the store.
meanings.sent3: The magazine with funny jokes made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a magazine of creative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The colorful magazine cover caught my eye.

meanings.definition: A compartment in a firearm for holding cartridges.
meanings.sent1: The soldier loaded the bullets into the magazine.
meanings.sent2: He checked the magazine of his gun before the mission.
meanings.sent3: The magazine in the gun was like a small storage box.
meanings.sent4: His weapon was a magazine of power waiting to be unleashed.
meanings.sent5: The magazine clicked into place as he prepared to shoot.
